markdownRemark.html: This hotel with it's beautiful golf course is located 7kms from La Cala de Mijas. If you are an avid golfer, this is one of your destinations for a relaxing golf break. It has three 18-hole playing fields ( Campo América , Campo Asia and Campo Europa ) a 6-hole par 3 course and La Cala Golf Academy with multilingual professionals and all the necessary infrastructures to learn how to play golf or to improve your game. The 4-star Hotel is part of the complex and offers a wide range of sports, a restaurant, health, beauty and leisure facilities and services.

frontmatter.title: La Cala Resort Hotel
frontmatter.description: La Cala Resort Hotel - This hotel with it's beautiful golf course is located 7kms from La Cala de Mijas. The 4-star Hotel is part of the complex and offers a wide range of sports, a restaurant, health, beauty and leisure facilities and services.
frontmatter.address: La Cala de Mijas, Mijas Costa, 29647 Málaga, Spain
frontmatter.price: Highest green fee weekdays 62.00 euros, Highest green fee weekends 62.00 euros
tags: Top golf courses Costa del Sol
